entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve code readability by using extention methods #63485
  • Document the memory model guaranteed by dotnet/runtime runtimes #63474
  • OOB Library's AssemblyVersion is inconsistent between ref and src assemblies in servicing #63467
  • [wasm][debugger] Show a better stack trace for final user #63466
  • [wasm] Make WasmMainJSPath optional #63465
    7.0.0
  • Json SourceGen tests are not running on .NET Framework #63463
  • 6.0 source-build servicing builds are not producing all runtime libs/packages #63451
  • JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverter Returns ObjectDefaultConverter, Insted of Expected Null #63444
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails for covariant properties when [JsonIgnore] is specified #63443
  • [macos][arm64][CoreCLR] DllImportGenerator.Unit.Tests failed: Segmentation fault #63439
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.21568.2]Etymology App failed to launch with error that Header's referrer is missing #63479
    7.0.0
  • Add json deserialize interface attribute to specific class #63436
  • [Perf] Changes at 12/28/2021 6:18:01 PM #63453
  • Poor codegen for Vector128.Create() with constants sharing the same value #63432
    7.0.0
  • Apply ConstantExpected attribute in runtime repo APIs as needed #63426
    7.0.0
  • PhysicalFileInfo should report the right Length and LastModifiedTime for symbolic links #63424

Closed

  • System.Text.Json generator does not generate valid code for empty string default parameter constructors #62766
    6.0.x
  • Cant start generated program on linux (Ubuntu) #63267
  • .NET Version: 6.0.1 Fatal Error Runtime at IP 00007FF696C3917B with exit code 80131506 (ExecutionEngineException?) #63127
  • .Net6: When i enable server gc mode my application start crashing frequently. #63070
  • Enable using live ref pack in source generator unit tests #60605
    7.0.0
  • [quesion] mono touch hold monoobject* in internal call behavior? #63440
  • Expose a property in System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage which will give the remote ip it connects to #38407
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add Source-Process Property to TcpConnectionInformation #63099
  • Delegates are poorly inlined and optimized #63425
  • Convert remaining SAL v1 annotations to SAL v2 annotations #63307
  • Socket ReceiveAsync method has bug when receiving multicast packets #63327
  • The Microsoft.NETCore.App runtime for .NET preview7 is missing when install .NET6 preview7 and 6.0.100 GA at the same time. #63096

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #63482
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Make it easier to enable FEATURE_AUTO_TRACE #63478
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add Regex FindFirstChar optimization for a literal after an atomic loop #63477
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix Fiji time zone time conversion #63476
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Fix gc_heap::remove_ro_segment #63473
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix NETStandard library using JSON source gen #63472
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Clarify P/Invoke shims guidance for OOB assemblies #63470
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Do not set `GTF_NO_CSE` for sources of block copies #63462
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce buffer size used in XmlReader when using Async mode #63459
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Include properties on records for (de)serialization in source-gen #63454
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Bump SdkVersionForWorkloadTesting to use a 200 band SDK #63450
    area-Infrastructure
  • Handle embedded assignments in copy propagation #63447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Mark constant arguments of HWINTRINSIC nodes as DONT_CSE #63442
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WebSocket tests on NodeJS #63441
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Disable MemoryMappedFileTests failing on macOS/arm64 + coreclr due to too long path #63438
    area-System.IO
  • Move init-vs-env in test build script down #63433
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Align rva fields in reflection emit #63430
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [wasm][tests] Fix, and simplify sample building on CI #63429
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Improve use of {Last}IndexOf{Any} in Regex loops #63428
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix Regex if-then-else code generation #63427
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Ensure UserSecretsIdAttribute is added to assembly #63423
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 6.0.2
  • [Arm64] Keep unrolling InitBlock and CopyBlock up to 128 bytes #63422
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make DllImportGenerator unit tests' compilations use live refs #63410
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix bugs with generation for ctor param default values #62798
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Making user secrets optional by default #62917
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.2
  • JIT: save generics context for late devirtualization #63420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure UserSecretsIdAttribute is added to assembly #63415
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [DRAFT][Perf][Mono] Enable llvm for arm perf runs #63311
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Make some icalls pass/return object references using ObjectHandleOnStack/QCallTypeHandle #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [DllImportGenerator] Remove DLLIMPORTGENERATOR_ENABLED define option #63464
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix stack overflow with X509Certificate FriendlyName #63179
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reorganize zlib dependency logic #63365
    area-Build-mono
  • Refactor DllImports in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd #63421
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix bug where we reference the entry #0 in the pinned plug queue #63351
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • Fix time reporting for the merged tests #63452
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix XXHash for stripe size #61923
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.2
  • [6.0] Fix named mutexes on OSX to work between arm64 and emulated x64 processes #62765
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Change macOS activatin injection failure handling #63393
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Unify the FlushProcessWriteBuffers mechanism for macOS arm64 / x64 #63301
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • Convert SAL1 to SAL2 #63333
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix test filtering for debugger tests on windows #63380
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Include properties on records for (de)serialization in source-gen #62668
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] GetProperties broken on chrome #63403
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • 'cmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-codeflow
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeSpan support in sourcegen #62191
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62193
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix custom JsonConverterFactories not working with nested type/property declarations. #62643
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1541200 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Draft][Perf] Enable LLVM on perf runs #63504
  • Update runtime.json with manjaro information #63338
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Initial changes for emscripten 2.0.34 #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Update coverlet and reportgenerator versions #63491
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [debugger] Fix reading a byte without checking the version of the Protocol #63503
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Suppress warnings about [Obsolete] member usage in JSON src-gen'd code #63501
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Make delegates unsupported by JsonSerializer #63495
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Enable IDE0059 analyzer: Unnecessary assignment of a value #63340
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Webpack & NextJS & TypeScript samples #63335
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add more automated test coverage for the wasm bindings as prep for custom marshalers #63498
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/6.0] Add explicit null-check for tailcalls to VSD #62769
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure the JIT view of InstructionSets is correct in the face of JitConfig switches #62420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/6.0] Fix bugs with generation for ctor param default values (#62798) #63493
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Enable regions by default #59283
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Split `sendtohelixhelp.proj` to extract wasm, and mobile bits to separate files. #63373
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63196
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringLanguageAttribute #62995
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RateLimiting] Dequeue items when queuing with NewestFirst #63377
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix the MacOS remote unwinder for VS4Mac #63405
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • [metadata] Borrow bits from MonoClassField:parent for flags #63302
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0-maui] Add back HAVE_SYS_ZLIB support #63359
    area-Build-mono
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Host
  • improve TLS resume on server #63030
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor optimizing morph for commutative operations #63251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix LocalCertificateSelectionCallback on unix #63200
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, os-mac-os-x
  • add instructions for running on FreeBSD #63417
    community-contribution
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allow CreateScalarUnsafe to be directly contained by hwintrinsics that support scalar loads #62407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ABI stress test coverage #63409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #63058
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix translation of Ping error codes #63237
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Implement the last of the approved cross platform hardware intrinsics, except shuffle #63414
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
    area-System.Diagnostics, os-android
